item.title: Honey-Balsamico Sauce
item.description: Ingredients 3 shallots 1 apple 1 tsp. oil 20 g butter 20 g flour 200 ml vegetable broth 3 tbsp. balsamico 2 tbsp. honey 1 twig rosemary Directions Chop the shallots into thin rings. Cut the apple into small pieces. Chop the rosemary finely. Heat the oil in a pan. Sweat the shallots and apple until the shallots are lucent. Set the shallots and apple to the side.
